website_summaries.verdict: These vintage-style bar stools with backs are ideal for tall kitchen counters or bars. The distressed finish adds a nice rustic touch.
pros: Sturdy wood frame that is highly durable yet comfortable
Well-placed footrests at different heights around the legs
cons: A small number of buyers note some stools arrived with uneven legs, making the stool wobbly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs!  But the paint is chipping already?
customer_reviews.text: *** Update **** After maybe 10 minutes of gentle use, some of the paint is buckling and peeling? Still handsome chairs but this isn't the distressed vintage look. This is paint that doesn't stick to the wood. I posted a photo. ----- Original review ---- As others are saying, these are very well-made and the color is beautiful. It's not the bright green that the product photo shows, a much nicre muted blue/green. They are very nicely and gently distressed to look vintage and I'm very impressed. Highly recommend. Not too hard to put together either. I bought an allen bit set for my power drill and now I don't need to use those tiny allen wrenches they always provide.
customer_reviews.author: J in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy! We wanted to carry our Teal decor color into the kitchen and these fit the bill. I would describe them as a "dusty teal blue" color....I know color is so hard online. Easy to assemble, easy to wipe clean from messy fingers, sturdy enough for my two kids 2&6 to climb up on by themselves and not tip over.
customer_reviews.author: K. Love

customer_reviews.title: Great counter chairs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these counter chairs when we moved into a new house to match the 4 dining chairs that I bought 5 years ago. Surprising, the color match was almost perfect. The design is very sturdy, enough for my kids to stand and hop from one seat to the next on a daily basis despite the cautionary commentary from Mom and for some pretty big bottoms that tend to plop instead of sit gently. Great price, great product. I would recommend these and will probably be buying one more set.
customer_reviews.author: chyning1

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Paint was very rough in places (like there was dirt in the paint)--see photo. Fit of parts was such that there was no way I wanted these chairs in my house. Finally there were several cracks in wood. I returned the chairs, and will not buy again. However, I must say I am thoroughly satisfied with Amazon, as they accepted the return without question.
customer_reviews.author: Squid

customer_reviews.title: Love the color & made well.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my large center Island and my big and little kids ages 4 to 14! I waited to do a review after getting my 1st order to make sure I liked color and was made well ect. After a couple weeks ordered 4 more. I recommend for anyone. My only regret is the price has increased and continues to increase! Must be popular and I highly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools! They are beautiful, comfortable, and very sturdy! I do agree with some reviews I’ve read, however, regarding the paint being a bit substandard... Seems like Ashley really dropped the ball when it comes to quality control. There is one place on the seat of one of my chairs that looks like a screw hole has been puttied over and not sanded down. You can see it thru the paint. I plan to use cushions so it won’t be seen, but still... I’m disappointed in Ashley for letting this one ship from the factory. Overall, though, I’m very, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: CDLephants

customer_reviews.title: sent wrong leg  and Amazon hasn't been helpful~
customer_reviews.text: I love the bar stools, love how solid and good wood. I plan to spray paint them navy blue. The problem is, the company sent one wrong leg. Each stool has leg 1 and leg 2. In our box (it comes to stools to a box), we received three 1s and one 2. When I called Amazon to have the correct leg sent, they told me I had to box up the whole thing and return. One bar stool is totally assembled, the other half assembled, and the box has been broken down and recycled. No other option was given. I use Amazon daily! This is very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Reason why four stars only
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Four chairs for a new look in the kitchen. The color (light green) is fantastic and the overall look of the chair is great. My rating is for three chairs though. The leg on one of the chairs snapped off during installation and renders the chair useless. Because they come in two I couldn't return one. We examined all the chairs and they are sound so better to have it fall apart before someone was sitting on it. The other three are being used daily, they are comfortable and really pretty in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Bradford

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We had a difficult time finding these anywhere and were somewhat apprehensive about having to assemble them..We didn't have to worry at all. They were easy to assemble, very reasonably priced and promptly delivered. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W. English

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHAIRS - perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I am not very mechanically oriented, but I was able to assemble these chairs about 30 minutes. They are super strong, solid wood, and very sturdy, yet not too heavy. They look great in hay house at the kitchen bar area and are the perfect height. Couldn't be more pleased. Country looking for my guesthouse.
customer_reviews.author: pHrx

customer_reviews.title: Defective product twice
customer_reviews.text: We've received this item twice. The first time it was missing screws. The second time it came with a broken leg... We're waiting for a third replacement because it matches so well, but if it's defective this third time I'll find another product.
customer_reviews.author: Am. Custom.

customer_reviews.title: Less green, more muted turquoise  (love)
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and not difficult to put together. nice, smooth finish, easy to clean and sturdy. I put two together, with a two year old helping, in about 30 minutes. I found a drill bit to help speed it along and then hand tightened with the provided hex. (smaller than average female who prefers to let men put things together when possible, though handy when necessary). I'd buy again and will if ever I have a need for more or the tallee set. The color (on my phone) is a little different, less green. More of a muted or gray-washed turquoise, which is actually perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: C.Snave

customer_reviews.title: Get these before they’re gone .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase and I would highly recommend these chairs to anyone. I thought they may be difficult to assemble, however I was very wrong. With great instructions to follow and a little help from home they where i installed in no Tom. They are a beautiful accent two are kitchen/family room area. The quality speaks for itself .
customer_reviews.author: Annie carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Took very little time to assemble, but would recommending using a drill with an allen tip. Makes the whole thing finished in just a few minutes. Good quality--my 250lb husband is comfortable on these. They don't wobble and the screws dont come lose over time like some other stools.
customer_reviews.author: Heather3

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 chairs. Took about an hour to put them all together. Build quality good, sturdy, color is pretty consistent, same seat height as existing set. Not high-end, but will suffice for our needs. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Renegade

customer_reviews.title: broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: product was purchased used on amazon but pieces were missing, broken and mislabeled. Tried 3x to get 4 barstools and every one was a disaster. returning all. the one i got together of the 6 was not of good sturdiness either.
customer_reviews.author: Duswix

customer_reviews.title: You will have to shim every chair.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. The representation I see in the photos are accurate. After assembly feel like rocking chairs because the legs are not cut do exact length. How or why is this possible as I assume it's done on a machine? So you'll have to put some filler shim under one of the legs. I have six chairs in there all uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Hilltop196

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color!!!
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous!!! It’s a perfect pop of color for my white kitchen with black island. The counter height fits nicely with my kitchen island bar. I was watching the price on the Ashley site, but they never went lower than Amazon’s price. Arrived on time as quoted and easy enough to assemble. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna L Dean

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Parts
customer_reviews.text: I got three sets of these (so 6 stools total). The first set went together perfectly. The next 4 stools all had at least one wrong part that made them impossible to assemble. I’d love these stools if there wasn’t so much wrong with the parts. I need at least 4 stools, but at this point I’m afraid to order another set (I don’t feel like boxing up yet another package if I have to return it). I will likely end up disassembling my 2 remaining stools and ordering a completely different product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: decent chairs, had an issue putting one together, amazon sent me replacement package so i got 2 good chairs at the end of the day. pkg was a pain in the butt to return but thats the chance you take.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre P

customer_reviews.title: Great item, horrible shipping
customer_reviews.text: We love the chairs, they work perfectly under our kitchen island and they match other standard sized chairs from Ashley. It took nearly 5 weeks to ship them from Florida to Ohio. This had us so frustrated that we considered buying something else just to move on. Like the chairs, just buy them in person. The counter seems to sent or damage the chairs slightly, because the wood seems pretty soft but at the purchase price they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these stools because I already have the the table and chairs from this set in my breakfast room and wanted the matching stools to go at our island in the kitchen. I love this set but the stools are slightly more blue and less blue green than the chairs that I already own. It's not a huge deal and the two are far enough apart from one another to not be an issue, but I was a little bummed when I pulled them out of the packaging. That being said the stools are solid and comfortable and best of all easy to clean when you have little kids in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and heavy...exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these for the high bar in our villa overseas. They are heavy, very sturdy, and will look great with my other furniture when it arrives. I can't say they are "comfortable," but that is not their purpose for me. My children sit here to eat breakfast. You could add a cushion, but I won't as I need to wipe the stools clean. Thumbs up. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: joyfulmamaof5

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but not the color as described
customer_reviews.text: These are nice chairs and I was very happy to find at this price but there was no BLUE in the GREEN at all. If you are looking for any bluish tint, this is not the one. This is a farmhouse green, or an antiqued green but not a hint of blue. Luckily they did accept my return and I went with a gray instead.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable; hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are really unique and perfect for my space, but they are not easy to put together. The instructions are confusing and not labeled well, and the screws don’t go in very easily. I bought four chairs but limit myself to assembling one per day when i get home from work; too much cussing and frustration at the end of a workday. Two done, two to go. One chair was wobbly as one leg was shorter than the others, and the side bar of that same chair did not fit flush against the legs of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful counter stools
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who's come to our home loves these stools. I have a whilte kitchen, and they are a beautiful greenish-blue, mostly green. It took some time to put the chairs together (about 3 hours) I bought 6. They went a lot faster after my husband found a ratchet. The seat is deep. I wish the foot rest more protected, but then, a bar would look bad, so I'll hope it doesn't looked scuffed very soon. I love them! All pieces were good, no cracks or problems. Also, don't tighten any screws until all are partly in.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to assemble and described perfectly. They ship in the same box that they would come from if you ordered it at a furniture store and the instructions are easy to follow. A great product that I would purchase over and over again for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty, but one chair damaged
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to assemble and very sturdy. I bought two that per great and decided to buy more two more to finish out the set. The second set had damage on one of the chair backs, but it wasn't enough to make me send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were even better than expected. Color was perfect and true to what is shown. They are sturdy and well made. Took me about 20 minutes to put 2 stools together. One tip...Do Not tighten the legs fully until you insert the foot rest, and side bars. Ordered on a Thursday and arrived the next Thursday, about a week ahead of expected delivery. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Broken chair/leg
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed in this. It hurts to give them 1-star because I've ordered this product before. Sadly I'll be returning them and will buy local instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: I ordered them to match that exact color and they did so I am an exceptionally happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: My stools arrived less than 48 hours after I placed the order and I'm not a prime member. They look exactly as pictured. I ordered them to match that exact color and they did so I am an exceptionally happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Joscelynn M. LaForge

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without any directions and screws for just one of the two barstools. They cannot send missing screws so now I have to try and get everything into the box. VERY INCONVENIENT
customer_reviews.author: Sean Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 more!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our kitchen and liked them so much that we purchased another set to add more seating. Assembly wasn't bad and we've had no issues. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LMSU

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Good construction. Good hardware fasteners. Good shape. Good height. Greater width.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: They're beautiful and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It has a very comfy big seat and feels like heavy sturdy wood. Beautiful paint and color.
customer_reviews.author: laysea

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs, color is awesome and the quality for price is spot on! Over all super happy with my purchase I love my counter height bar stools!!!!
customer_reviews.author: McKenna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but bring your muscle
customer_reviews.text: Love! They were a bit difficult to put together because of the screws being difficult to turn but now that they're together they're gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best stools ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these stools. They are sturdy, classy and a beautiful aqua color. The legs have flat feet which make it good for attaching felt pads. I've had so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Eppler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these chairs! I found them in a couple different furniture stores for almost double the price. The color is beautiful!!! If you’re on the fence about these, just get them!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy they were to put together. Sturdy and great color.
customer_reviews.author: DeLanna Allen

customer_reviews.title: We’re happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these! Look good. Easy to assemble. Sturdy. Like the color.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & good price!
customer_reviews.text: I received these quicker through amazon then I could’ve directly from Ashley furniture and for half the price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. I ordered the tall set and I've had them about a year now. They are still in great shape and have held up really well. They were easy to put together and look great in my apartment. I totally plan on ordering another set if I ever end up with a bar area large enough for 4 chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made no complaints in that area ,was disappointed with color. I assumed because it says blue green,there would have been a hint of blue. I would have preferred teal than sage. It does look like sage green.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. They look a lot more expensive than they are.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs, wrong part, poor service
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived with incorrect parts, two left legs and missing the right leg. I tried called customer support but was unable to place the call as my number would not stick. I currently have one chair put together abd the other just sitting there. Customer support is poor!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! St
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! The color is pretty, the chairs are super sturdy and great quality. We asked our handyman friend to assemble while he was at our house doing work and it took him less than an hour for all 4.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sage green color
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble...my 16 yr old put all of 4 them together in about an hour. Seem sturdy and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around to find that Amazon had the best price on these island stools. My wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan H

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bar stools! My only wish is that they could be purchased individually. I have 2 and need 3, but no space for 4.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar Stool
customer_reviews.text: Stool easy to assemble, sturdy, and comfortable. Good stool for the price with attractive finish.
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and they look great in my place!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these stools! They are the perfect color to match our decor, and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are gorgeous! And less expensive here on Amazon than any other store. They are sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michi the vegan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are so easy to assemble and work perfectly! The look is just what I wanted and price was right!
customer_reviews.author: guyanna

customer_reviews.title: Great color and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these barstools. Perfect height and perfect size to sit on. Only wish you could order them single not in a set.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: great chair! amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy nice looking chairs for an amazing price. They're definitely green with no hint of blue though. The only thing we added were the feet at the bottom. I love them
customer_reviews.author: liz amazon user

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is the best chair we have ever purchased, love the color, it is in excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Goldenlks

customer_reviews.title: Lovely blue green with distressing. Fits perfectly with any ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely blue green with distressing. Fits perfectly with any vintage or farmhouse decor. One chair did end up slightly wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Really love the color. The only problem is they are all 4 wobbly (purchased 2 sets). If not for that I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tandi Carlile

customer_reviews.title: You will love these bar stools!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools. Super sturdy, comfortable and not bad for short legs!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 chairs for my bar. Two of the chairs the holes did not match up and one of them rock a tad. They are very cute and I love the color, but they seem to be poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are good, shipping box however was full of broken glass. Be careful when opening.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS E ONEILL

customer_reviews.title: Too low for kitchen bars!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these chairs! They look great in my apartment, but they’re not tall enough for kitchen bars. Check out the difference in height before you buy!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Andreas Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stools but one of them was not made correctly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stools but one of them was not made correctly. The support for the legs and the holes cut for them do not line up properly. Therefore the side supports for the legs are lower where they connect in the front then they are in the back and it looks very bad.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: I am thoroughly happy with these stools
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly happy with these stools. They are sturdy and the seat is a bit wider than other stools. The color isn't aqua but blue/green.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Chair is very comfortable to sit and has a solid feel
customer_reviews.text: Chair is very comfortable to sit and has a solid feel. The color looks very cool, with a beach cottage type of feel to it. It was easy to put together once we found the instructions online. The instructions in the box are not complete. One bolt hole had a small dab of paint in it that I scrapped out in a couple of minutes so it was not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: goblue03

customer_reviews.title: Nice stools
customer_reviews.text: Just like the photos and description. Would have preferred a bit more green color but love yhem just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Szustak

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are wobbly - they are beautiful but wobbly even on an even surface.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great stools
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools. They took a few hours to assemble 4, but they are great. I've had them for about 2 months now and I'm still very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: patsfan

customer_reviews.title: great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Stools are beautiful, very country looking...alil off balance but nothing that not an easy fix ...well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Raimundi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chairs. We ordered 8 chairs (4 sets) and 6 out of the 8 are uneven!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are heavy & sturdy. Exactly what I was looking for & a great price. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: I have the dining chairs I'm glad I got the bar stools.
customer_reviews.author: zakiya johnson

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with scratches on the legs, missing 6 screws and send two #1 leg. Cannot even assemble. Ridiculous and unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these stools and the set is starting to get hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Matched my Ashley chairs perfectly and the height was exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Your busted

customer_reviews.title: Just need one leg
customer_reviews.text: The left front leg was broke,, I’ve contacted Amazon twice !! Please help
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schambach

customer_reviews.title: One barstool is fine. Assembly fairly easy
customer_reviews.text: One barstool is fine. Assembly fairly easy. The other came with a misfabricated leg. The holes don’t match for the support bars because of it. Looks crooked and not sturdy. Was not noted in purchasing notes. Requesting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mastroantonio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for us. Easy to put together and the color was just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Hauskins

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Well made, strong enough to hold a heavy load! Looks great in our house by the lake!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Degroote

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bar stools look perfect in my transitional style kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bar stools look perfect in my transitional style kitchen. Not difficult to put together and very well made. I love the beautiful blue/green color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful. I receive tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. I receive tons of compliments. I have had them for about 5 months and I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the chairs: They're sturdy, the finish is nice and the color is a good accent to a kitchen of dark wood cabinets/white subway tile backsplash/whitish granite.
customer_reviews.author: judy cartwright

customer_reviews.title: More blue than green.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but definitely more blue than green. Bummer because our kitchen is greener than blue. Gotta go back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Van Buren

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO BUILD AND SOLID WOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Those that put these together wrong because they suck at following directions need to remove those fake 1-2 Star reviews... if you have any sense of how stuff works you wont even need the directions to put these chairs together... ITS THAT EASY. These are SOLID wood chairs, no cheap crap particle board and look AMAZING, I'd recommend these to anyone that requires some unique bar stools!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Minor

customer_reviews.title: Love these bar stools
customer_reviews.text: We love these bar stools! Easy to assemble, perfect color and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is worth it
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look great for my island. My dog likes them too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and seem high quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: I like the barstool
customer_reviews.text: I like the barstool, easy to assemble. Love the rusty look n color. To bad it to to longer to get them otherwise would at gave them a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Azucena H

customer_reviews.title: but overall love the chairs and fit perfectly for my kitchen and ...
customer_reviews.text: Color did not seem to fit description, but overall love the chairs and fit perfectly for my kitchen and dining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and the perfect shade of blue green
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Sturdy and the perfect shade of blue green. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H

customer_reviews.title: Great color, good quality stool
customer_reviews.text: Got 4 of these for my kitchen island. The color is great, although the online pics don't do it justice. I found these chairs for sale on several websites (there are like 2 amazon postings at least, and the Ashley website) and the color looks different in every single pic. It's really a muted turquoise, more blue than green. My kitchen is a dove white and a pale grey color, and these match the pallet very well. I have wood floors, all 4 chairs sit level and are just find. Assembly wasn't too bad, we had not issues or missing parts etc. All in all, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jess0507

customer_reviews.title: Shortest barstool ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the shortest "bar stools" ever. I have the matching chairs and this so called bar stool is only one inch taller than a regular chair. Measure carefully and don't for one second think this is for a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Snediker

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley Mestler Bar Height Bar Stool, Blue/Green
product_meta.description: Size:Bar HeightYour home is more than a house, it’s the daily moments and experiences you share that make it uniquely you. At Ashley Furniture, we celebrate being home with you. We are passionate about being the best and most affordable furniture providers for your home. Rooms are meant for living and dreaming. Helping you furnish your home inspires us in everything we do. From designing collections and products around the latest trends, to looking for ways to reduce costs.
feature_bullets: SET OF TWO VINTAGE-INSPIRED PUB HEIGHT BARSTOOLS: Classic open double X back bar stools are both rustic and modern. This comfortable pub-heigt design is the perfect height for chatting or dining at the kitchen island or kitchen counter
UNIQUELY CRAFTED: Sturdy wood frames with foot rails on every side, for comfort at any bar or countertop
DISTINCTIVE GREEN BLUE HUE: Enjoy the time-worn antique blue patina finish.
GREAT FOR TALL COUNTERS: At 23"W x 19"D x 45"H with a 30" seat height and 12" front footrest, pub height barstools are ideal for kitchen counters and rathskellers alike
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, hardware and tools included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget
